item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is Luan Guimarães, I was born in 1995 in Brasília, the capital of Brazil, in the middle of Cerrados, which is known as the Brazilian savannah, the second largest biome in Latin America. So it’s not impressive that I’m passionate about nature, especially for the life and the sky. And, of course, I am an outdoor sports lover, a mix of: climbing, mountain biking, trekking and sailing. My boat’s name is Kubernetes.
